channel.title: What server source should i take?
channel.description: Hi guys, I'm working on my server(berlinscape) and I don't want my old crappy source! I want a new one. But i dont know which one?!? I need a source that has some good features built in but is easy to code on! I just dont know what source. Does anyone have an idea=? RS CHamp2

item.title: What server source should i take?
item.dc:creator: @Jorsa Jorsa
item.description:
@Jorsa wrote:

i think you mean you recommend JorsaScape.

Read full topic
item.source: What server source should i take?

item.title: What server source should i take?
item.dc:creator: @RS_CHamp2 RS CHamp2
item.description:
@RS_CHamp2 wrote:

Its gonna be in varrock but that aint mean u have to pk there! I made i much better for mods and admins, because they can right click ban, ipban, and many more mod commands listed there. Now also, if someone does nocliping, they will get warned automatically and get kicked. The third time they do it, they get banned!
Now the server shouldn’t lagg that much anymore and it takes a lot of weight off the mods and admins!
P.S:should be back up now! Try it under berlinscape.ath.cx port:43594
Thanks
RS CHamp2

Read full topic
item.source: What server source should i take?

item.description:
@kill_bill wrote:

rs champ plz put berlinscsape up[br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2007, 03:18:41 PM[/size][hr]and ill say a pk 1 but u cant pk in varrok u can pk everywhere else

item.source: What server source should i take?

item.title: What server source should i take?
item.dc:creator: @RS_CHamp2 RS CHamp2
item.description:
@RS_CHamp2 wrote:

Thanks guys! I think ill take a pimpscape related one. Its called Ownage Pk . Its quiet good because it has some basic WORKING!!! features and is easily coustamizable. The teleports work, it has not too many but enough GOOD shops in varrock and doesn’t lagg. There are many other features I could list up but won’t. Thanks guys, now that I know, i will and can only RECOMMEND
PIMPSCAPE: or any other related ones such as: dunescape, ownage pk, newpimpscape, ultimate pk etc…
ThAnKS
RS CHamp2

Read full topic
